list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Access Denied page and update layout for role-based views
- Introduced a new AccessDenied.cshtml view for unauthorized access handling. - Updated _Layout.cshtml to conditionally render the layout based on user roles. - Modified multiple views to use the appropriate layout depending on user roles. - Added authorization attributes to several controllers to enforce role-based access.

project.component: { "keyToString": { ".NET Launch Settings Profile.HTTP.executor": "Debug", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.HTTPS.executor": "Debug", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Use asynchronous method for fetching categories
Replaced synchronous calls to `_categoryManager.GetAllCategories` with the asynchronous `GetAllCategoriesAsync` in multiple actions within `ProductController`. This improves performance and better aligns with asynchronous programming practices.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
Use asynchronous method for fetching categories
Replaced synchronous calls to `_categoryManager.GetAllCategories` with the asynchronous `GetAllCategoriesAsync` in multiple actions within `ProductController`. This improves performance and better aligns with asynchronous programming practices.

task.summary:
Remove AccountController and related Account views
Deleted `Register` and `Login` functionalities, including the `AccountController` and corresponding Razor views (`Register.cshtml` and `Login.cshtml`). Updated `Home/Index` to remove links to Account actions, reflecting the elimination of account-related features.

Refactor user and role management to improve modularity
Replaced direct usage of Identity managers with custom interfaces (`IUserManager`, `IRoleManager`) across controllers and services. Standardized user and role operations while enhancing maintainability. Updated views to use consistent layouts and addressed minor issues in DTO mappings.

Add Access Denied page and update layout for role-based views
- Introduced a new AccessDenied.cshtml view for unauthorized access handling. - Updated _Layout.cshtml to conditionally render the layout based on user roles. - Modified multiple views to use the appropriate layout depending on user roles. - Added authorization attributes to several controllers to enforce role-based access.

MESSAGE.value:
Use asynchronous method for fetching categories
Replaced synchronous calls to `_categoryManager.GetAllCategories` with the asynchronous `GetAllCategoriesAsync` in multiple actions within `ProductController`. This improves performance and better aligns with asynchronous programming practices.

Remove AccountController and refactor ProductController.
Deleted AccountController as part of the cleanup. Updated ProductController to leverage asynchronous methods for better performance. Simplified navigation links in Home/Index view, removing references to the AccountController.

Remove AccountController and related Account views
Deleted `Register` and `Login` functionalities, including the `AccountController` and corresponding Razor views (`Register.cshtml` and `Login.cshtml`). Updated `Home/Index` to remove links to Account actions, reflecting the elimination of account-related features.

Refactor user and role management to improve modularity
Replaced direct usage of Identity managers with custom interfaces (`IUserManager`, `IRoleManager`) across controllers and services. Standardized user and role operations while enhancing maintainability. Updated views to use consistent layouts and addressed minor issues in DTO mappings.

Add Access Denied page and update layout for role-based views
- Introduced a new AccessDenied.cshtml view for unauthorized access handling. - Updated _Layout.cshtml to conditionally render the layout based on user roles. - Modified multiple views to use the appropriate layout depending on user roles. - Added authorization attributes to several controllers to enforce role-based access.

option.value:

- Introduced a new AccessDenied.cshtml view for unauthorized access handling. - Updated _Layout.cshtml to conditionally render the layout based on user roles. - Modified multiple views to use the appropriate layout depending on user roles. - Added authorization attributes to several controllers to enforce role-based access.
